name: Really Simple Pink Lady Herbal Blossom Tea infused Syrup
description: Simple syrup is a solution of dissolved sugar and water, so no need to worry about the sugar settling to the bottom of your cocktail as you sip.
preparation: Whisk all ingredients in a Multipurpose pot - 8 cup with a Piano Wire Whisk.
Cook over medium heat until reduced by about half, and syrup coats the back of a spoon. Strain and refrigerate up to 10 days until ready to serve.

products.name: Multipurpose Pot - 8 Cup
summary: An 8 cup, multi-use, stainless-steel cooking pot with a lid made of glass, steel & silicone rubber.
